title: No Home Movie 2015 Web-DL Sonata Premiere
description: The great Belgian filmmaker Chantal Akerman (Almayerâ€™s Folly) crafts a moving portrait of her relationship with her mother, an Auschwitz survivor whose harrowing past and chronic anxiety has greatly shaped her daughterâ€™s art. No Home Movie is a sober, profoundly moving portrait of Akerman's mother in the months leading up to her death, when she was mostly confined to her Brussels apartment. A Polish Jew who survived Auschwitz, Akerman's mother suffered from chronic anxiety all her life, an affliction that fuelled much of her daughter's creative output and helped shape Akerman's thematic preoccupations with gender, sex, cultural identity, existential ennui, solitude, and mania
